abstract.shortdesc: The examplefig element triggers the display of a heading indicating whether the sample is a correct or incorrect usage of the element.

rule.rule-statement: Identify the type of example using the judgement attribute.
rule.justification: The attribute is picked up by the processing system and generates one of two images for the title.
rule.examplefig: <examplefig><codeblock> <task> <title>Turn off the alarm</title> <steps> <step> <cmd>Click the <uicontrol>Turn off</uicontrol> button.</cmd> </step> <step> <cmd>Enter your code on the dial pad</cmd> </step> </steps> <result>The alarm is off. The system emits a long beep.</result> </task> </codeblock></examplefig>
